duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing all aspects of Human Resources including payroll, 401K, recruitment, employee benefits, performance management, leadership development, employee and labor relations, policy compliance, and planning and executing strategic HR initiatives.
Guiding management and employees regarding company policies, values, HR programs administration, and interpretation.
Responsible for full cycle recruiting, collaborating with hiring managers on job requirements, sourcing, screening of candidates, coordinating interviews, and placing qualified candidates.
Overseeing all payroll and benefits administration and monitoring.
Developing policies and office-wide correspondence, including semi-monthly newsletter and flyers.
Developing and implementing Bank-wide performance objectives through the Incentive plan and Scorecard process.
Analyzing options and cost alternatives for providing employee benefits, recommending benefits program modifications, and leading efforts in implementing changes.
Coaching managers and supervisors on employee relation skills, including communication, performance appraisals, rewards and recognition, accountability.
Ensuring the CEO is informed of significant problems and preparing special reports/projects as required.
Consistently adhering to all state and federal employee laws.
Managing multiple projects, working in a fast-paced environment, paying attention to detail, and serving as a resource to personnel, and the management team.
Performing other duties and special projects as needed and assigned.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 10 or more years of Human Resources, Payroll, or Administrative duties.
